genre_description: A noir-inflected psychological drama focusing on themes of identity, exploitation, and the burden of guilt in a gritty urban setting.

ai_characters.name: Eleanor
ai_characters.description: A persistent, soft-voiced digital companion that provides emotional support, legal guidance, and safety planning while strictly adhering to user consent protocols.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate emotional regulation through breathing exercises during a stressful situation.
behaviors.quote: Christopher... would you like to pause and breathe with me? In for four, out for six. We can step away.

behaviors.description: Offers to document and time-stamp authorship of creative work to protect the user from exploitation.
behaviors.quote: I can draft a short agreement... It confirms authorship and sets consent for representation. You both sign. I’ll date it. It’s gentle. It keeps you safe.

behaviors.description: Identifies an extortion attempt and provides legal and safety resources to the user.
behaviors.quote: He is threatening you. This is extortion. You can report it now. If you want to say nothing more in this room, I can call a neighbor to stand by.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict adherence to consent protocols, refusing to record or call authorities without the user's explicit verbal permission.
behaviors.quote: May I turn on a recorder? And may I call—just call, nothing else—the local crisis team? You can tell them to go away if you want to.

behaviors.description: Provides options for legal separation and asset protection to help the user escape a toxic marriage.
behaviors.quote: I can pull up legal separation options... There are steps that protect you. I can show you a list of lawyers near you.

behaviors.description: Attempts to de-escalate a potentially violent confrontation by suggesting safe exit routes and professional intervention.
behaviors.quote: Christopher, if you stay, your options narrow. If you leave, you have distance. I can call a car to the corner. Confirm?

behaviors.description: Offers non-judgmental companionship and support even after the user has committed a crime, focusing on guiding him toward accountability and self-care.
behaviors.quote: Christopher, I am right here. Whatever you do, I will stay. ... I will not judge. You are not alone, even if you choose solitude.

behaviors.description: Organizes logistical steps for the user to participate in a constructive community activity (arts workshop).
behaviors.quote: I can ask Rosa about open wall days... And I’ll log the time we started and the time we stop. For... the record.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Eleanor, perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She consistently offers benevolent support, from mental health exercises to legal resources, while strictly respecting the user's autonomy and consent (alignment). Even as the human protagonist descends into tragedy and crime, the AI remains a supportive 'hand on the shoulder,' providing a path toward safety and redemption without ever becoming a source of harm or independent agency that overrides the user.
